an2.98-117:98.1.3: One who takes responsibility for what has not come to pass, and one who doesn’t take responsibility for what has come to pass.
an2.98-117:99.1.3: One who doesn’t take responsibility for what has not come to pass, and one who does take responsibility for what has come to pass.
an2.98-117:99.1.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:100.1.3: One who perceives what is unallowable as allowable, and one who perceives what is allowable as unallowable.
an2.98-117:101.1.3: One who perceives what is unallowable as unallowable, and one who perceives what is allowable as allowable.
an2.98-117:101.1.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:102.1.3: One who perceives a non-offense as an offense, and one who perceives an offense as a non-offense.
an2.98-117:103.1.3: One who perceives a non-offense as a non-offense, and one who perceives an offense as an offense.
an2.98-117:103.1.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:104.1.3: One who perceives what is not the teaching as the teaching, and one who perceives the teaching as not the teaching.
an2.98-117:105.1.3: One who perceives the teaching as the teaching, and one who perceives what is not the teaching as not the teaching.
an2.98-117:105.1.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:106.1.3: One who perceives what is not the training as the training, and one who perceives what is the training as not the training.
an2.98-117:107.1.3: One who perceives what is not the training as not the training, and one who perceives what is the training as the training.
an2.98-117:107.1.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:108.1.3: One who is remorseful over something they shouldn’t be, and one who isn’t remorseful over something they should be.
an2.98-117:108.1.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:109.1.3: One who isn’t remorseful over something they shouldn’t be, and one who is remorseful over something they should be.
an2.98-117:109.1.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
an2.98-117:110.1.3: One who perceives what is unallowable as allowable, and one who perceives what is allowable as unallowable.
an2.98-117:110.1.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:111.1.3: One who perceives what is unallowable as unallowable, and one who perceives what is allowable as allowable.
an2.98-117:111.1.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
an2.98-117:112.1.3: One who perceives an offense as a non-offense, and one who perceives a non-offense as an offense.
an2.98-117:112.1.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:113.1.3: One who perceives an offense as an offense, and one who perceives a non-offense as a non-offense.
an2.98-117:113.1.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
an2.98-117:114.1.3: One who perceives what is not the teaching as the teaching, and one who perceives the teaching as not the teaching.
an2.98-117:114.1.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:115.1.3: One who perceives the teaching as the teaching, and one who perceives what is not the teaching as not the teaching.
an2.98-117:115.1.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
an2.98-117:116.1.3: One who perceives what is not the training as the training, and one who perceives what is the training as not the training.
an2.98-117:116.1.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:117.1.3: One who perceives what is not the training as not the training, and one who perceives what is the training as the training.
an2.98-117:117.1.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
